name: cf-ai-cloudflare-app
description: AI-powered chat application built on Cloudflare's platform using the Agents SDK with Llama 3.3 on Workers AI

scripts.build: cd agents-starter && npm run build || (cd agents-starter && vite build)
scripts.deploy: cd agents-starter && (npm run deploy || (vite build && wrangler deploy --config wrangler.jsonc))
